title: ‘Atlanta’ Season 4, Episode 4 Recap
description:
Charles and Van dive into colorism and broken black family drama as they analyze the fourth episode of the final season of ‘Atlanta.’
Hosts: Charles Holmes and Van Lathan
Associate Producer: Jonathan Kermah
